app.title: DuckType
app.tagline: Type like a duck to water

test.startTyping: Start typing to begin the test
test.clickToFocus: Click here or press any key to focus

stats.wpmDesc: Words Per Minute — typing speed based on correct characters
stats.rawWpmDesc: Raw WPM — total typing speed including errors
stats.consistencyDesc: How stable your typing speed was throughout the test
stats.cpmDesc: Characters Per Minute — character-based typing speed

settings.title: Settings
settings.freedomModeDesc: Allow going back to previous words

daily.title: Daily Challenge
daily.description: A new challenge every day. 60 seconds, English, with punctuation.
daily.comeBack: Come back tomorrow for a new challenge!
daily.reminderMessage: Keep your streak alive — today's challenge is ready

practice.title: Practice
practice.weakKeysDesc: Practice your weakest keys based on your typing data
practice.noData: Complete some tests first to identify your weak keys

profile.title: Profile
profile.heatmapDesc: Error rate by key (green = good, red = needs practice)
profile.noKeyData: Complete some tests to see your keyboard heatmap
profile.rankUnlocksAt: Level up to unlock new ranks

challenge.beatFriend: Your friend typed {{wpm}} WPM. Can you beat them?
challenge.lost: Your friend typed {{wpm}} WPM. Try again!

auth.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.errorPasswordShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.errorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.savePromptDesc: Sign up to save your stats, achievements, and streaks to the cloud. Access them from any device.
auth.usernameHint: This name will appear on the leaderboard
auth.errorUsernameChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.name: name
leaderboard.empty: No entries yet. Be the first!
leaderboard.checkRank: Where do you rank? Check the leaderboard

info.speedDesc: Take a quick typing test and instantly see your WPM, accuracy, and percentile ranking among typists worldwide.
info.trackDesc: Earn XP, level up through 10 ranks, unlock achievements, and maintain daily streaks as you improve.
info.langDesc: Practice in English, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, or Russian.
info.tip1: Focus on accuracy first — speed follows naturally once you build muscle memory. Aim for 95%+ accuracy.
info.tip2: Use proper home row placement (ASDF JKL;) and reach for keys without looking at the keyboard.
info.tip3: Practice 10–15 minutes daily. Short, consistent sessions beat occasional long ones.
info.tip4: Use the keyboard heatmap and weak key lessons to target your specific problem areas.
info.benchmarkNote: The average office worker types around 40 WPM. With regular practice on DuckType, most people reach 80+ WPM within a few months.
info.howWpmDesc: WPM (Words Per Minute) is the standard measure of typing speed. Each "word" is standardized to 5 characters including spaces, ensuring fair comparison across languages and word lengths.
info.improveDesc: Try our structured typing lessons or practice your weak keys to boost your speed and accuracy.
